TopicTitle: AIM-9 Sidewinders wont lock on targets

Articles.Content:
I got a problem and my missiles wont make a noise. AIM-120 is the only thing i can use for destroying planes

 

Mod:BD Armory (Latest 1.0.5) version 

Version(KSP): 1.0.2 (I want to use the KW Rocketry since i missed it so much so I brought the version to 1.0.2)

Everything is normal except the Sidewinder
This is an issue with the BDA mod, NOT with KSP itself. You should direct the issue to either the BDArmory Continued thread or to its Github issues list.

Hi sorry to say that support will be non existent for old versions of BDA  especially as there have been so many changes to BDA since 1.02.    . You'd be much better off creating another updated to 1.22  installation and using the latest BDAc
